text: Francis Alick Howard, known as Frankie Howerd OBE (6 March 1917 - 19 April 1992) was a British comedian and comedy actor. He was born in York, North Riding of Yorkshire. He starred in several movies, including Carry On Doctor and Carry On Up the Jungle. He starred in television series including Up Pompeii!. He was a promiscuous homosexual and lived with his manager-partner Dennis Heymer (1928-2009) from 1955 until his death.Forbidden love Howerd died of heart failure in Fulham, London. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Actors from York Category:British stand-up comedians Category:Comedians from Yorkshire Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:English LGBT people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT comedians Category:1917 births Category:1992 deaths
title: Frankie Howerd
